derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin, from Latin petra 'rock' (from Greek) + Latin oleum 'oil'

entry.def: Petroleum is oil which is found under the surface of the earth or under the sea bed. Petrol and paraffin are obtained from petroleum.
